\Okta\Resource

\Okta\ResourceFactor

Implementation of the Okta Factors (MFA) resource, access via $okta->factor

http://developer.okta.com/docs/api/resources/factors.html

reset()

reset(string  $uid, string  $fid) : null

User ID
string $fid

Factor ID

Returns

null —

verify()

verify(string  $uid, string  $fid, array  $verification = null) : object

Verifies a factor.

Parameters

string $uid

ID of user
string $fid

ID of factor
array $verification

Array of factor verification properties

Returns

object —

Factor verification result object. If the answer is invalid you will receive a 403 Forbidden status code.

Tags

None found

string $fid

ID of factor

Returns

poll()

poll(string  $uid, string  $fid, string  $tid) : object

Polls a push verification transaction for completion. The transaction will have a result of WAITING, SUCCESS, REJECTED, or TIMEOUT.

Parameters

string $uid

ID of user
string $fid

ID of factor
string $tid

ID of transaction

Returns

object —

Factor verification result object

Tags

None found
